statements: UPDATE security_audit SET auditor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE audit_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
UPDATE security_audit SET vulnerabilities_found = 'Buffer overflow vulnerability detected' , database_name = 'CustomerDB' WHERE audit_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765'
UPDATE security_audit SET database_name = 'ProductionDB', vulnerabilities_found = 'SQL Injection' WHERE audit_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE security_audit SET auditor_name = 'John Doe', audit_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE vulnerabilities_found = 'Cross-Site Scripting';
UPDATE Audits SET audit_status = 'Completed' WHERE audit_id = 1;
UPDATE Vulnerabilities SET vulnerability_severity = 'High', vulnerability_description = 'Critical vulnerability identified' WHERE vulnerability_id = 3;
UPDATE Audits SET audit_status = 'Completed' WHERE audit_id = 1;
UPDATE Vulnerabilities SET vulnerability_severity = 'High', vulnerability_description = 'New vulnerability discovered' WHERE vulnerability_id = 3;
UPDATE security_audit_reports SET findings = 'Fixed the security vulnerabilities' WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE security_audit_logs SET user_id = '98765432-12d3-4e56-a89b-426614174000' , action_taken = 'Reviewed audit findings' WHERE log_id = '23456789-12d3-4e56-a89b-426614174000'

UPDATE security_audit_logs SET action_taken = 'Reviewed and approved findings.', user_id = 'c82b2c74-1cc6-4a95-ba25-71dc78b65109', audit_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE log_id = '4b4d1b00-9a2a-4c9d-8321-9b98c451289b'
UPDATE security_audit_users SET role = 'Administrator', username = 'johndoe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 'a19ea15b-7328-4697-9244-914175f5e905'
UPDATE audit_logs SET event_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8'
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET description = 'New vulnerability description', severity = 'HIGH' WHERE vulnerability_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8'
UPDATE audit_logs SET event_description = 'User authentication failed' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE security_checks SET result = 'Passed' WHERE check_type = 'Access Control' AND date_checked >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE SecurityAudits SET auditor_name = 'John Doe', findings = 'No findings identified' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Vulnerabilities SET status = 'Fixed', remediation_plan = 'Apply security patch' WHERE vulnerability_id = 5
UPDATE SecurityAudits SET audit_date='2022-10-15', auditor_name='John Doe' WHERE id=1
UPDATE Vulnerabilities SET status='Fixed', severity='Low' WHERE vulnerability_id=3
